turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Brittany, can you order me a frappacinno from Starbucks please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes of course, what location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about the one on Main street in Hampton?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a trenta tripple mocha frappacino with 2 extra shots of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok no problem, is that 2 extra shots you said?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes two extra shots and id also like to order another drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok im ready

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a venti black tea lemonade with 5 extra pumps of classic syrup, little ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok let me order those right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And add a muffin please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so thats a trenta triple mocha frappacino with 2 extra shots of espresso, a venti black tea lemonade with 5 extra pumps of classic syrup, and a muffin?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so the total is $12.43 Ill just charge it to your Starbucks card so you get your points.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready in about 15 mins at the Main street location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful. Thanks for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Let me know if you need anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will do Brittany, Your check is in the mail girl!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks! Goodbye
